33  public static $db;
34  public static $useTransformers = false;
35  public static $transformerOp = 'transform';

45  public static function getManyToOne($instance, $member, $included = false, $useCache = NULL) {
46  $classname = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
47  if (is_array ( $instance )) {
48  $instance = self::getOne ( $classname, $instance [1], false, null, $useCache );
49  }
50  $fieldAnnot = OrmUtils::getMemberJoinColumns ( $classname, $member );
51  if ($fieldAnnot !== null) {
52  $annotationArray = $fieldAnnot [1];
53  $member = $annotationArray ["member"];
54  $value = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
55  $key = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $annotationArray ["className"] );
56  $kv = array ($key => $value );
57  $obj = self::getOne ( $annotationArray ["className"], $kv, $included, null, $useCache );
58  if ($obj !== null) {
59  Logger::info ( "DAO", "Loading the member " . $member . " for the object " . $classname, "getManyToOne" );
60  $accesseur = "set" . ucfirst ( $member );
61  if (is_object ( $instance ) && method_exists ( $instance, $accesseur )) {
62  $instance->$accesseur ( $obj );
63  $instance->_rest [$member] = $obj->_rest;
64  }
65  return $obj;
66  }
67  }
68  }
69 
79  public static function getOneToMany($instance, $member, $included = true, $useCache = NULL, $annot = null) {
80  $ret = array ();
81  $class = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
82  if (! isset ( $annot )) {
83  $annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $class, "#oneToMany", $member );
84  }
85  if ($annot !== false) {
86  $fkAnnot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $annot ["className"], "#joinColumn", $annot ["mappedBy"] );
87  if ($fkAnnot !== false) {
88  $fkv = self::getFirstKeyValue_ ( $instance );
89  $ret = self::_getAll ( $annot ["className"], ConditionParser::simple ( $fkAnnot ["name"] . "= ?", $fkv ), $included, $useCache );
90  if (is_object ( $instance ) && $modifier = self::getAccessor ( $member, $instance, 'getOneToMany' )) {
91  self::setToMember ( $member, $instance, $ret, $modifier );
92  }
93  }
94  }
95  return $ret;
96  }
97 
108  public static function getManyToMany($instance, $member, $included = false, $array = null, $useCache = NULL) {
109  $ret = [ ];
110  $class = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
111  $parser = new ManyToManyParser ( $class, $member );
112  if ($parser->init ()) {
113  if (is_null ( $array )) {
114  $pk = self::getFirstKeyValue_ ( $instance );
115  $condition = " INNER JOIN `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "` on `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getFkField () . "`=`" . $parser->getTargetEntityTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getPk () . "` WHERE `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getMyFkField () . "`= ?";
116  $ret = self::_getAll ( $parser->getTargetEntityClass (), ConditionParser::simple ( $condition, $pk ), $included, $useCache );
117  } else {
118  $ret = self::getManyToManyFromArray ( $instance, $array, $class, $parser );
119  }
120  if (is_object ( $instance ) && $modifier = self::getAccessor ( $member, $instance, 'getManyToMany' )) {
121  self::setToMember ( $member, $instance, $ret, $modifier );
122  }
123  }
124  return $ret;
125  }
126 
133  public static function affectsManyToManys($instance, $array = NULL, $useCache = NULL) {
134  $metaDatas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( \get_class ( $instance ) );
135  $manyToManyFields = $metaDatas ["#manyToMany"];
136  if (\sizeof ( $manyToManyFields ) > 0) {
137  foreach ( $manyToManyFields as $member ) {
138  self::getManyToMany ( $instance, $member, false, $array, $useCache );
139  }
140  }
141  }
142 
153  public static function getAll($className, $condition = '', $included = true, $parameters = null, $useCache = NULL) {
154  return self::_getAll ( $className, new ConditionParser ( $condition, null, $parameters ), $included, $useCache );
155  }
156 
157  public static function paginate($className, $page = 1, $rowsPerPage = 20, $condition = null, $included = true) {
158  if (! isset ( $condition )) {
159  $condition = "1=1";
160  }
161  return self::getAll ( $className, $condition . " LIMIT " . $rowsPerPage . " OFFSET " . (($page - 1) * $rowsPerPage), $included );
162  }
163 
164  public static function getRownum($className, $ids) {
165  $tableName = OrmUtils::getTableName ( $className );
166  self::parseKey ( $ids, $className );
167  $condition = SqlUtils::getCondition ( $ids, $className );
168  $keyFields = OrmUtils::getKeyFields ( $className );
169  if (is_array ( $keyFields )) {
170  $keys = implode ( ",", $keyFields );
171  } else {
172  $keys = "1";
173  }
174  return self::$db->queryColumn ( "SELECT num FROM (SELECT *, @rownum:=@rownum + 1 AS num FROM `{$tableName}`, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r ORDER BY {$keys}) d WHERE " . $condition );
175  }
176 
185  public static function count($className, $condition = '', $parameters = null) {
186  $tableName = OrmUtils::getTableName ( $className );
187  if ($condition != '')
188  $condition = " WHERE " . $condition;
189  return self::$db->prepareAndFetchColumn ( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `" . $tableName . "`" . $condition, $parameters );
190  }
191 
202  public static function getOne($className, $keyValues, $included = true, $parameters = null, $useCache = NULL) {
203  $conditionParser = new ConditionParser ();
204  if (! isset ( $parameters )) {
205  $conditionParser->addKeyValues ( $keyValues, $className );
206  } elseif (! is_array ( $keyValues )) {
207  $conditionParser->setCondition ( $keyValues );
208  $conditionParser->setParams ( $parameters );
209  } else {
210  throw new DAOException ( "The \$keyValues parameter should not be an array if \$parameters is not null" );
211  }
212  return self::_getOne ( $className, $conditionParser, $included, $useCache );
213  }
214 
227  public static function connect($dbType, $dbName, $serverName = '127.0.0.1', $port = '3306', $user = 'root', $password = '', $options = [], $cache = false) {
228  self::$db = new Database ( $dbType, $dbName, $serverName, $port, $user, $password, $options, $cache );
229  try {
230  self::$db->connect ();
231  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
232  Logger::error ( "DAO", $e->getMessage () );
233  throw new DAOException ( $e->getMessage (), $e->getCode (), $e->getPrevious () );
234  }
235  }
236 
242  public static function startDatabase(&$config) {
243  $db = $config ['database'] ?? [ ];
244  if ($db ['dbName'] !== '') {
245  self::connect ( $db ['type'], $db ['dbName'], $db ['serverName'] ?? '127.0.0.1', $db ['port'] ?? 3306, $db ['user'] ?? 'root', $db ['password'] ?? '', $db ['options'] ?? [ ], $db ['cache'] ?? false);
246  }
247  }
248 
254  public static function isConnected() {
255  return self::$db !== null && (self::$db instanceof Database) && self::$db->isConnected ();
256  }
257 
258  public static function setTransformerOp($op) {
259  self::$transformerOp = $op;
260  }
